metadata.label: Appendix 3 - CR3 Scenario
metadata.description:
Long-term management of asthma with inhaled bronchodilators and corticosteroids.
This scenario exposes the parameters for a comprehensive asthma management approach including Low Dose Beclometasone, High Dose Beclometasone, and Inhaled Short-Acting Beta Agonist interventions.
This was the mapping for the CR3 Scenario in Appendix 3 simulations.
Low Dose Beclometasone reduces the disability weight of persons living with Asthma by 8% and reduces asthma case fatality by 50%.
High Dose Beclometasone reduces the disability weight by 13.2%.
Inhaled Short-Acting Beta Agonist provides symptom relief, reducing the disability weight by approximately 1%.
All three interventions increase their target coverage from the baseline of five percent to ninety-five percent, which was a standard coverage change for Appendix 3 simulations.
This should typically be run as a comparison scenario, with the baseline scenario being the Asthma Baseline, or this same scenario but with the target coverage having a smaller scale-up coverage.

Low Dose Beclometasone Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Low Dose Beclometasone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Low Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Start Ye.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Low Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Final Ye.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Low Dose Beclometasone Population In Nee.description: The proportion of persons with asthma who require the intervention

Low Dose Beclometasone Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Baseline Coverag.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Start Y.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

High Dose Beclometasone Scale-Up Final Y.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

High Dose Beclometasone Population In Ne.description: The proportion of persons with asthma who require the intervention

High Dose Beclometasone Disability Impac.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention

Inhaled Short Acting Beta Agonist Baseli.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Inhaled Short Acting Beta Agonist Target.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Inhaled Short Acting Beta Agonist Scale-.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon
The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Inhaled Short Acting Beta Agonist Popula.description: The proportion of persons with asthma who require the intervention

Inhaled Short Acting Beta Agonist Disabi.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention
